mapper.insert: insert into plan( p_id, p_name, p_breeding, p_habits, p_place, p_form, p_img, p_water, p_message, u_id ) values(#{p_id}, #{p_name}, #{p_breeding}, #{p_habits}, #{p_place}, #{p_form}, #{p_img}, #{p_water}, #{p_message}, #{u_id} )
mapper.select: select * from plan where p_habits like concat('%',#{id},'%')
select t_name from type where name = #{name} and t_id = #{t_id}
